avatar.description: Use the avatar prop as an object and configure it with any of its props.
avatar.description_zh: Use the avatar prop as an object and configure it with any of its props.

color.description: color can be any color from the ui.colors object or white (default).
color.description_zh: color can be any color from the ui.colors object or white (default).

variant.description: variant can be solid (default), outline, soft or subtle
variant.description_zh: variant can be solid (default), outline, soft or subtle

description.description: You can add a description in addition of the title.
description.description_zh: You can add a description in addition of the title.

closeButton.description: Use the close-button prop to hide or customize the close button on the Alert.
closeButton.description_zh: Use the close-button prop to hide or customize the close button on the Alert.

actions.description: Use the actions prop to add actions to the Alert.
actions.description_zh: Use the actions prop to add actions to the Alert.
